abstract: In a commencement address to graduating students of LaGuardia Community College, Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs drew on his own journey – from a housing project in Brooklyn to the top of one of Wall Street’s mightiest firms – to offer life advice.
snippet: In a commencement address to graduating students of LaGuardia Community College, Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs drew on his own journey – from a housing project in Brooklyn to the top of one of Wall Street’s mightiest firms – to offer life ad...
lead_paragraph: Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive and chairman of Goldman Sachs, tried out a new role on Thursday: inspirational speaker.

headline.main: From Blankfein, a Horatio Alger Story for New Graduates
